typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EXtractionSAP
source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR as string,
		User_lowerCase as string,
		source as string,
		Right_DR as string,
		Right_User_lowerCase as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReferentielAtc4
MapDrifted1 filter({ATC Client}!="#") ~> FiltreATCClient
ReferentielAtc4 aggregate(groupBy(ATC),
	Right_DR = max(Right_DR)) ~> UniqueATC
FiltreATCClient, UniqueATC join({ATC Client} == ATC,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JointureATC
NomCli select(mapColumn(
		NoNiv1 = {Niveau 1},
		Niv1 = {_c4},
		NoNiv2 = {Niveau 2},
		Niv2 = {_c10},
		NoNiv3 = {Niveau 3},
		Niv3 = {_c6},
		NoNiv4 = {Niveau 4},
		Niv4 = {_c30},
		NoCli = Client,
		NomCli,
		Dept = {Dép},
		Ville = {Localité},
		NoGrpCli5 = {Groupe de clients 5},
		GrpCli5 = {_c26},
		NoGrpCli = {Groupe de clients},
		GrpCli = {_c24},
		PartnerID = {Récept. de march.}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
EXtractionSAP derive({_c2} = toString(byName('_c2')),
		{_c4} = toString(byName('_c4')),
		{_c6} = toString(byName('_c6')),
		{_c8} = toString(byName('_c8')),
		{_c10} = toString(byName('_c10')),
		{_c18} = toString(byName('_c18')),
		{_c22} = toString(byName('_c22')),
		{_c24} = toString(byName('_c24')),
		{_c26} = toString(byName('_c26')),
		{_c28} = toString(byName('_c28')),
		{_c30} = toString(byName('_c30')),
		{_c32} = toString(byName('_c32')),
		{_c34} = toString(byName('_c34')),
		{_c36} = toString(byName('_c36')),
		{_c39} = toString(byName('_c39')),
		{_c41} = toString(byName('_c41')),
		{_c43} = toString(byName('_c43'))) ~> MapDrifted1
JointureATC derive(NomCli = {_c10}) ~> NomCli
Rename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SortieNomenclatureCLient.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieNomenclatureClient

source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hi�rarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hi�rarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{D�signation Statut} as string,
		{D�b. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> hierarchieArticle
hierarchieArticle select(mapColumn(
		NoCanalDist = CDis,
		NoArt = Article,
		Article = Description,
		NoNiv1 = {N1.locale},
		NoNiv2 = {N2.locale},
		NoNiv3 = {N3.locale},
		NoNiv4 = {N4.locale},
		NoNiv5 = {N5.locale},
		NoNiv6 = {N6.locale},
		NoNiv7 = {N7.locale},
		Niv1 = {N1.locale.designation},
		Niv2 = {N2.locale.designation},
		Niv3 = {N3.locale.designation},
		Niv4 = {N4.locale.designation},
		Niv5 = {N5.locale.designation},
		Niv6 = {N6.locale.designation},
		Niv7 = {N7.locale.designation}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameArticle
RenameArticle aggregate(groupBy(Article),
	NoCanalDist = max(NoCanalDist),
		NoArt = max(NoArt),
		NoNiv1 = max(NoNiv1),
		NoNiv2 = max(NoNiv2),
		NoNiv3 = max(NoNiv3),
		NoNiv4 = max(NoNiv4),
		NoNiv5 = max(NoNiv5),
		NoNiv6 = max(NoNiv6),
		NoNiv7 = max(NoNiv7),
		Niv1 = max(Niv1),
		Niv2 = max(Niv2),
		Niv3 = max(Niv3),
		Niv4 = max(Niv4),
		Niv5 = max(Niv5),
		Niv6 = max(Niv6),
		Niv7 = max(Niv7)) ~> Unique
Unique derive(CanalDist = iif(NoCanalDist=="43",
"Chantier/Contract Business",
iif(NoCanalDist=="42", 
"Diffus/One-off",
 iif(NoCanalDist=="51",
  "FS",
   iif(NoCanalDist=="45", 
   "Constructeurs/CMI", 
   iif(NoCanalDist=="40",
    "Non core Business",
     '')))))) ~> CanalDist
CanalDist select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		NoArt,
		NoNiv1,
		NoNiv2,
		NoNiv3,
		NoNiv4,
		NoNiv5,
		NoNiv6,
		NoNiv7,
		Niv1,
		Niv2,
		Niv3,
		Niv4,
		Niv5,
		Niv6,
		Niv7
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SortieNomenclatureProduit.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> nomenclatureProduit

source(output(
		Fournisseur as string,
		{Coopérative} as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		{Désignation} as string,
		Mois as string,
		{CA 2020} as string,
		{CA 2019} as string,
		{Qte 2020} as string,
		{Qte 2019} as string,
		path as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		Famille as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		REFFOURNISSEUR as string,
		{Qte Livrée 2020} as string,
		{Qte Livrée 2019} as string,
		{Code Dispo Cde} as string,
		{Code SAPAIG} as string,
		{CA sans Marge} as string,
		{CA sans Marge A-1} as string,
		{Evol. CA A/A-1} as string,
		{Qte Livrée} as string,
		{Qte Livrée A-1} as string,
		{Evol. Qte A/A-1} as string,
		{Qté Livrée 2020} as string,
		{Qté Livrée 2019} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		{Nom Coopérative} as string,
		{CP Coop.} as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		BrandID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
getYear derive(month = iif(lower(Mois)=="janvier", "01",      iif(lower(Mois)=="février","02",     iif(lower(Mois)=="mars", "03",      iif(lower(Mois)=="avril", "04",      iif(lower(Mois)=="mai", "05",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juin", "06",      iif(lower(Mois)=="juillet", "07",      iif(lower(Mois)=="août", "08",      iif(lower(Mois)=="septembre", "09",      iif(lower(Mois)=="octobre", "10",      iif(lower(Mois)=="novembre", "11",      iif(lower(Mois)=="décembre", "12", "0")))))))))))),
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> monthToNumber
yearmonth filter(!isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNotNull
monthToNumber filter(isNull(qte_ecoulement)) ~> quantityNull
quantityNotNull filter(!isNull({Coopérative})) ~> cooperativenotNull
organisation filter(!isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> orgaCooperativeNotNull
orgaCooperativeNotNull aggregate(groupBy({Nom Coopérative},
		HubSAPid),
	POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid)) ~> unique
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
cooperativenotNull, unique join({Coopérative} == {Nom Coopérative},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftOrganisation
leftOrganisation filter(isNull({Nom Coopérative})) ~> leftOuter
monthToNumber derive(yearmonth = year+month,
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonth
innerOrganisation derive(marque_id = iif(lower(marque_file)=="vaillant", 1621, 1604)) ~> typeCaste
typeCaste select(mapColumn(
		marque_file,
		reference = {Référence},
		article = {Désignation},
		qte_ecoulement,
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Fournisseur,
		{Coopérative},
		{Référence},
		{Désignation},
		Mois,
		path,
		qte_ecoulement,
		REFFOURNISSEUR
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive(year = regexExtract(path, "(\\d+)", 1)) ~> getYear
ecoulement derive({Référence} = coalesce(REFFOURNISSEUR,{Référence})) ~> DerivedColumn1
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Région Statistique} as string,
		Enseigne as string,
		{Marque DESC} as string,
		{Marque Code} as string,
		{Sous Famille} as string,
		{Référence Article Fournisseur} as string,
		{Article National DESC} as string,
		{Article National Code} as string,
		{Agence Code} as string,
		{Agence DESC} as string,
		{Département DESC} as string,
		{Département ID} as string,
		Secteur as string,
		{Quantité en UV BL} as string,
		{Année Précédente (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{Cumul Exercice A-1 (Quantité en UV BL)} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N} as string,
		{MOIS CA PRR N-1} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul} as string,
		{CA PRR au cumul N-1} as string,
		fileName as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ORCABECOULPREPARED
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_QTE_NULL.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> quantityNullOutput
leftOuter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['ORCAB_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound

source(output(
		{Nom Fournisseur Principal} as string,
		Clients as string,
		{Code Agence} as string,
		{Libellé Agence} as string,
		{Code postal agence} as string,
		{Ag Siret} as string,
		Siren as string,
		MKT1 as string,
		MKT2 as string,
		MKT3 as string,
		{Reference Fournisseur} as string,
		Libelle as string,
		{Qté Livré Mois A} as string,
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1} as string,
		{Qté Livré Cumul A} as string,
		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1} as string,
		{VVA MOIS} as string,
		{VVA MOIS N-1} as string,
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE} as string,
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ecoulement
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> venteDirecte
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file = {Nom Fournisseur Principal},
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		MKT1,
		MKT2,
		MKT3,
		Reference = {Reference Fournisseur},
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{Qté Livré Mois A-1},
		{Qté Livré Cumul A},
		{Qté Livré Cumul A-1},
		{VVA MOIS},
		{VVA MOIS N-1},
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE},
		{VVA CUMUL EXERCICE N-1},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoice
columnChoice derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = toInteger({Qté Livré Mois A}),
		yearmonth = trim(replace(split(path, "-")[3], ".xlsx", ""), " ")) ~> typeCaste
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIdNotNull
posIdNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMidString = max(POSSAMidString),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> unique
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> InnerJoin
typeCaste, unique join({Code Agence} == POSid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoin
LeftJoin filter(isNull(POSid)) ~> Outer
cleansingVenteDirecte aggregate(groupBy(yearmonth_right,
		Article,
		{Code client}),
	{Qté ventes directes} = sum({Qté ventes directes})) ~> uniqueKey
venteDirecte derive({Qté ventes directes} = toDouble({Qt� vente directe}),
		yearmonth_right = replace(yearmonth, " ", ""),
		Article = replace(Article, " ", ""),
		{Code client} = replace({Code client}, " ", "")) ~> cleansingVenteDirecte
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& Reference == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin
InnerJoin derive(Reference = replace(Reference," ",""),
		POSSAMidString = replace(POSSAMidString," ","")) ~> cleansingEcoulement
cleansingEcoulement, uniqueKey join(yearmonth == yearmonth_right
	&& Reference == Article
	&& POSSAMidString == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin
ecoulementVenteDirecteInnerJoin filter(isNull(yearmonth_right) || isNull(Article) || isNull({Code client})) ~> leftOuter
eccoulementVenteDirecteLeftJoin derive({Qté ventes directes} = iif({Qté ventes directes}<0, toDouble(0), {Qté ventes directes})) ~> rendreZeroLesVentesDirectesNegatives
rendreZeroLesVentesDirectesNegatives derive({Qté Livré Mois A} = {Qté Livré Mois A}-{Qté ventes directes}) ~> enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte
enleverQuantiteVenteDirecte, leftOuter union(byName: true)~> fullLeft
fullLeft select(mapColumn(
		Marque_file,
		Clients,
		{Code Agence},
		{Libellé Agence},
		{Code postal agence},
		{Ag Siret},
		Siren,
		Reference,
		Libelle,
		{Qté Livré Mois A},
		{VVA MOIS},
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
dropColumnsInCommon derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> exctractYear
exctractYear filter(!isNull({Qté Livré Mois A})) ~> quantityNotNull
exctractYear filter(isNull({Qté Livré Mois A})) ~> quantityNull
Addcolumn select(mapColumn(
		marque_file = Marque_file,
		agence_code = {Code Agence},
		{Code postal} = {Code postal agence},
		reference = Reference,
		qte_ecoulement = {Qté Livré Mois A},
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMidString,
		marque_id = BrandID,
		year,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
quantityNotNull derive(canal = '',
		Dept = '') ~> Addcolumn
Outer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PARTEDIS_ORGANISATION_NOTFOUND.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> organisationNotFound
quantityNull sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['OeccPartedis.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> quantityNullOutput
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,

		{Qté facturée} as integer,
		{CA facturé} as double,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationAP
cleansing filter({Canal distribution}==42 || {Canal distribution}==51) ~> keep42and51
keep42and51 derive(fact_filter1 = iif( instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yfar")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1),
		fact_filter2 = iif(instr(lower({Type de facture}),"yafb")==0 && instr(lower({Motif commande}),"fas")==0, 0, 1)) ~> factureFilter
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerPlateforme
innerPlateforme select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommonInner
prixMoyen sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> sort
dropColumns keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addKey
addKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousID
addKey, renameToPrevious join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinPreviousRow
sort derive(prix_unitaire = {CA facturé}/{Qté facturée}) ~> prixUnitaire
dropColumnsInCommonInner aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier}),
	{Qté facturée} = max({Qté facturée}),
		{CA facturé} = max({CA facturé})) ~> prixMoyen
prixUnitaire select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns
previousID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPrevious
addKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextID
nextID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next prix_unitaire} = prix_unitaire,
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNext
joinPreviousRow, renameToNext join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNextRow
joinNextRow derive({Changement de période} = iif({previous Article}!=Article || {previous WholeSalerID}!=WholeSalerID || {previous Année civile}!={Année civile}, 
    1, 

    iif(abs(({previous prix_unitaire}-prix_unitaire)/{previous prix_unitaire})>0.1, 1, 0))) ~> changementDePeriode
changementDePeriode filter({Changement de période}==1) ~> changementDePeriodeFiltre
joinNewNextID derive({Durée_période} = iif(WholeSalerID=={previous WholeSalerID} && Article=={previous Article} && {Année civile}=={previous Année civile}
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
    
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , toString({Mois calendrier})+"/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}))
    
    , iif(WholeSalerID=={next WholeSalerID} && Article=={next Article} && {Année civile}=={next Année civile}
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-"+toString({next Mois calendrier}-1)+"/"+toString({Année civile})
        
        , "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile})))) ~> DureePeriode
UnionFacturation derive({Canal distribution} = toInteger({Canal distribution})) ~> cleansing
DureePeriode sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon1
dropColumnsInCommon1 filter(!isNull(WholeSalerID) || !isNull(Article) || !isNull({Année civile}) || !isNull({Mois calendrier}) || !isNull(prix_unitaire) || !isNull({Durée_période})) ~> dropNULL
facFilter, plateforme join(trim({Récept. de march.}, " ") == trim(HubSAPid, " "),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftPlateforme
leftPlateforme filter(isNull(HubSAPid)) ~> leftOuterPlateforme
leftOuterPlateforme aggregate(groupBy(Article,
		{Année civile}),
	prix_unitaire = mean({CA facturé}/{Qté facturée})) ~> prixUnitaireLeft
prixUnitaireLeft derive({Durée_période} = "1/"+toString({Année civile})+"-12/"+toString({Année civile}),
		join = 1) ~> dureePeriodeLeft
plateforme aggregate(groupBy(WholeSalerID),
	HubName = max(WholeSalerHubID)) ~> uniqueWholeSalerID
uniqueWholeSalerID select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> drop
drop derive(join = 1) ~> join
dureePeriodeLeft, join join(dureePeriodeLeft@join == join@join,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumnsInCommon
dropNULL select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dropColumns2
dropColumnsInCommon derive({Période} = 1) ~> addperiod
dropColumns2, averagePrix union(byName: true)~> Union1
factureFilter filter(fact_filter1==0 || fact_filter2==0) ~> facFilter
Sort2 keyGenerate(output(ID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> addNewKey
changementDePeriodeFiltre select(mapColumn(
		WholeSalerID,
		Article,
		{Année civile},
		{Mois calendrier},
		prix_unitaire
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> deletePreviousAndNext
deletePreviousAndNext sort(asc(WholeSalerID, true),
	asc(Article, true),
	asc({Année civile}, true),
	asc({Mois calendrier}, true)) ~> Sort2
addNewKey derive(ID = ID-1) ~> nextNewID
nextNewID select(mapColumn(
		{next WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{next Article} = Article,
		{next Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{next Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{next ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToNextNew
addNewKey derive(ID = ID+1) ~> previousNewID
previousNewID select(mapColumn(
		{previous WholeSalerID} = WholeSalerID,
		{previous Article} = Article,
		{previous Année civile} = {Année civile},
		{previous Mois calendrier} = {Mois calendrier},
		{previous ID} = ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renameToPreviousNew
addNewKey, renameToPreviousNew join(ID == {previous ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewPreviousID
joinNewPreviousID, renameToNextNew join(ID == {next ID},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinNewNextID
addperiod, dropColumns2 join(dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID == dropColumns2@WholeSalerID
	&& dropColumnsInCommon@Article == dropColumns2@Article,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
join2 filter(isNull(dropColumns2@WholeSalerID) || isNull(dropColumns2@Article)) ~> leftJoin
leftJoin select(mapColumn(
		Article = dropColumnsInCommon@Article,
		prix_unitaire = dropColumnsInCommon@prix_unitaire,
		{Durée_période} = dropColumnsInCommon@{Durée_période},
		WholeSalerID = dropColumnsInCommon@WholeSalerID,
		{Période}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> averagePrix
facturationAC, facturationAP union(byName: true)~> UnionFacturation
Union1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TEMP_PRIX_PAR_PERIODE.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> dureePeriodeOutput

	&& {Référence} == {code produit},

		no_offre = upper(no_offre)) ~> DerivedColumn1
offreNotNULLoffre derive({DateFinValidité} = split({DateFinValidité}, " ")[1]) ~> DerivedColumn2

facturationbw derive(date_id = replace({Jour calendaire},'-','')) ~> transfoDate
transfoDate derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthh
extractYearMonthh derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc

		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},
		qt_livr_e = {Qté livrée},
		ca_livr_ = {CA livré},
		qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},

		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter

		{ Org. commerciale} = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
